00013 #define GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    image) \
00015    ImageField * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new ImageField) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    if (image != NULL) \
00023       variable->setImage(image);
00024 
00025 #define GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00026    image) \
00027    GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, image) \
00028    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00029 
00030 #define GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00031    image) \
00032    GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, image) \
00033    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00034       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00035 
00036 #define GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00037    image) \

00039    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00040    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00041       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00042

00044    image) \
00045    GLAZIERY_IMAGEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, image) \
00046    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00047    variable->resizeToMinimum();
